abstract: NBC Universal, continuing to seek places outside the home where consumers can watch its programming, is signing a sales and content agreement with Arena Media Networks. Financial terms of the deal, to be formally announced today, are not being disclosed.

lead_paragraph: NBC Universal, continuing to seek places outside the home where consumers can watch its programming, is signing a sales and content agreement with Arena Media Networks. Financial terms of the deal, to be formally announced today, are not being disclosed.
